bibl.title: Excavations of the Quays and the Embankment in Front of Karnak Temples. Preliminary Report.
bibl.note: The excavation started in 2006. - See in part. pp. 73-74: 4. Area 4 (CFEETK operation 176) [Ptolemaic baths, built between the beginning of the IIIrd century and the first decades of the IInd century BC]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Mansour Boraik, Excavations of the Quays and the Embankment in Front of Karnak Temples. Preliminary Report.
Cahiers de Karnak 13 (2010) pp. 65-78, 18 figg. n./bl. et coul.

The excavation started in 2006. - See in part. pp. 73-74: 4. Area 4 (CFEETK operation 176) [Ptolemaic baths, built between the beginning of the IIIrd century and the first decades of the IInd century BC]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
